link.help: Links your osu! account to your discord account.
link.success:
Please authenticate your osu! account by setting the following code

`%1`

as your location on your osu! profile.

Once done, send the `%0auth` command.

new_link.help: Links your osu! account to your discord account.
new_link.success:
Go to the site http://localhost:3000/?code=%1 and follow the instructions.

**IMPORTANT:** Do not share this link with anyone as it is a private link containing a unique code generated for you.

auth.help: Authenticates yourself after linking you osu! account and setting the code on your profile page.
auth.success: Congrats, your account has been verified.
auth.wrong_code: Your location is not your given code. If you forgot your code or make a mistake in your username, please reuse the `%0link` command.
